templates.title: Initial Job Outreach
templates.subject: Experienced [Role] Looking to Join [Company]
templates.body:
Dear [Name],

I hope this email finds you well. I came across the [Role] position at [Company] and was immediately drawn to the opportunity.

With [X] years of experience in [Industry/Skills], I've [brief achievement]. I'm particularly impressed by [Company]'s [specific detail about company].

Would you be open to a brief conversation about how my background aligns with your team's needs?

Best regards,
[Your name]

templates.title: Referral Request
templates.subject: Seeking Your Insight: [Role] Position at [Company]
templates.body:
Hi [Name],

I noticed you work at [Company] and I'm very interested in the [Role] position currently available.

I've been [brief background] and I believe my experience in [skills/achievements] would be valuable to the team.

Would you be willing to refer me or share any insights about the role and team?

Thank you for your time,
[Your name]

templates.title: Product Launch
templates.subject: Introducing [Product]: [Key Benefit]
templates.body:
Hi [Name],

I noticed you're [observation about prospect's work/company] and thought you might be interested in [Product], which helps [target audience] to [key benefit].

We've helped companies like [social proof] achieve [specific result].

Would you be interested in a quick demo?

Best,
[Your name]
